title: Bella Bathrooms Offers An Incentive for Purchasing a Salamander Pump this Autumn
text:
(MENAFN Press) Bella Bathrooms are pleased to announce they can offer customers a further incentive when purchasing a Salamander Pump this autumn. Salamander has teamed up with iTunes and BOSE to create a special offer for customers when purchasing a new pump from their selected ranges. As an approved Bella Bathrooms can bring this exclusive offer to their customers.
Offering your customers the latest in shower pump technology has always been important at Bella Bathrooms as people strive to create luxury showers in their own home. Salamander is one of the UK’s leading manufacturers’ of shower pumps and they produce a fantastic range of high performance products to boost your showers water performance. Salamander prides themselves on producing top quality pumps which will be a valuable addition to your home making them the ideal company for Bella Bathrooms to be associated with.
Bella Bathrooms are an approved online supplier of this fantastic shower pump range and they view this association as important to the successful growth of the business. Salamander approved retailers are carefully selected as they only select retailers who offer the full range of pumps. Further to this their selection is based on Bella Bathrooms providing essential product information so that customers can easily select the correct shower pump for them. This association allows Bella Bathrooms customers access to these exclusive offers and cashback promotions which they offer.
Salamander Pumps offer customers premium pumps without the premium price tag which is an important asset for Bella Bathrooms whose mantra is to supply their customers with affordable luxury. Salamander’s “Sound Investment” offer is based on the most important feature of these high quality pumps. These smooth running pumps offer extremely quiet operation so that they fit seamlessly into your home and are said to be quieter than the average household kettle when in operation.
Salamander has teamed up with iTunes and BOSE to offer additional bonuses with the purchase of their quietest pumps. Buy a single pump from any of the RSP RHP RGP or ESP ranges and customers will receive a £25 iTunes voucher. If customers buy three pumps they will receive a free BOSE wireless speaker. Bella Bathrooms hopes this offer will drive further sales of this fantastic range of quiet shower pumps this autumn.
This offer is valid on shower pump purchases made between August the 1st 2015 and 30th of November 2015. Claims must be received by Salamander on or before the 31st of December 2015. Customers can download claim forms from the Bella Bathrooms website where all the necessary details are outlined. Customers must provide a proof of purchase to accompany their claim. Bella Bathrooms strives to build links with the best manufacturers in the business to offer their customers any offers that will benefit them.
Bella Bathrooms offer an extensive range of shower pumps including the full range of Salamander pumps the large majority of which are held in stock. This allows them to provide their customers with an efficient delivery service in fact Bella Bathrooms aim to provide next day delivery on their range of pumps. The DPD courier service they use allows customers to track their delivery and even gives them a predicted time slot to make the service as efficient as possible.
Bella Bathrooms are confident they can offer their customers the best prices available online across their range of pumps. Add to this the access customers have to exclusive offers such as this “Sound Investment” and you can see why Bella Bathrooms will continue to grow as one of the UK’s leading bathroom suppliers.
